definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Pers. offcial Ezr 5:3, Ezr 5:6, Ezr 6:6, Ezr 6:13; Saqarbouzana (ai, e, hv); LXXL Saqrabwzahv (Andr:M 87 * prop. ´[[מתרב]]:, Gk. Miqrobouza/nhv, = OIran. *Mithrabaužana, Mithra is delieverer (or the like), Mey Entst, J.32; Scheft:92 f. OIran. Šêtharabûzana, empire-delivering; Wkl:MVAG 1887, 281 f. conj. a title).
